channel.title: I am confused?
channel.description: I was banned for something that I didn't do today. For some reason I came back, and now I am unbanned? It said I advertised, when I didn't.

item.title: I am confused?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Oh, that first one may have been me as well, I don’t even remember. I think you made a thread about ddosing someone because they were ddosing you or something. Either way, that’s expired, and the other one was fixed.

EDIT - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,513263.0.html Yes that was from me, and it was for like a week or something.

Read full topic

item.title: I am confused?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:413645”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=515179.msg3740293#msg3740293 date=1315272966]
So you were banned for some misunderstanding, then unbanned today?
Ye me too. Banned for ‘ddosing’ when I was the one getting ddosed, nor do I own any type of hacking material…
Ah well, might as well post it up before I get banned again D:
[/quote]If I remember correctly, I received a PM saying you had been hacked (which a quick IP check and viewing of posts confirmed). I banned an IP that you were logged in from (or the hacker was logged in from, I should say) until you could recover your account. I don’t know why it would say ‘ddosing’, unless this is a different incident you are talking about…[/quote]

It’s the one that said (all from memory):
“Sorry Fridder, you’ve been banned from this forum! Reason: DDoS. It’s not permanent because it was partially self-defense.”

Meanwhile it was meant to expire September 4th, 2011 - Then September 3rd it got changed to a permanent ban…

I got hacked? o.o

Read full topic

Ah well, might as well post it up before I get banned again D:[/quote]If I remember correctly, I received a PM saying you had been hacked (which a quick IP check and viewing of posts confirmed). I banned an IP that you were logged in from (or the hacker was logged in from, I should say) until you could recover your account. I don’t know why it would say ‘ddosing’, unless this is a different incident you are talking about…
